events: Pauels was born in Die Coninc straet in 1370.
Lost sibling Eylwardo when Eylwardo was 0 in 1383.
Lost sibling Pieter when Pieter was 7 in 1383.
Lost father at the age of 14.
Lost sibling Oudrauen when Oudrauen was 8 in 1388.
Lost sibling Saswe when Saswe was 20 in 1391.
Lost sibling Rycaldis when Rycaldis was 22 in 1395.
Had Jacomin move into family home at Die Coninc straet.B.4 after marriage.
Got married with Jacomin at age 30 in 1399.
